content:
Adjusting your relaxation time to earlier in the evening can help you unwind and prepare for a restful night's sleep. Here's a revised schedule for Wednesday and Thursday:

**Wednesday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work on the report
* 12:30 pm - 1:00 pm: 30-minute walk
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 5:30 pm - 6:30 pm: Relaxation time (earlier unwind time!)
* 6:30 pm - 7:00 pm: Dinner break
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Free time (reading, listening to music, or other calming activities)

**Thursday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work on the report
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 5:30 pm - 6:30 pm: Relaxation time (earlier unwind time!)
* 6:30 pm - 7:00 pm: Dinner break
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Free time (reading, listening to music, or other calming activities)
* 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm: Yoga class

By adjusting your relaxation time to 5:30 pm - 6:30 pm on Wednesday and Thursday, you'll have a head start on unwinding before bed. This should help you feel more relaxed and prepared for a restful night's sleep. Remember to prioritize self-care and adjust the schedule as needed to suit your needs!
